info.description:
API definition for PDS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[Personal Demographics Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/personal-demographics-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Patient
tags.description:
Resource (schema): [FHIR Patient](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Patient.html)

 Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

 Tracking patient is the center of the healthcare process.

 Profile (constraints): [NHSDigital-Patient](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Patient.guide.md)

 ### identifier

At least one patient identifier, **MUST** be provided. Where a traced NHS number is available for a patient this MUST be included. 

Local identiers such as MRN **MUST** include a *system* which identifies NHS provider/assigning authority.

tags.name: RelatedPerson
tags.description:
Resource (schema): [FHIR RelatedPerson](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/RelatedPerson.html)

 Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

 Need to track persons related to the patient or the healthcare process.

 Profile (constraints): [UKCore-RelatedPerson](https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4Release1/Home/ProfilesandExtensions/ProfileUKCore-RelatedPerson)

 Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the RelatedPerson resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve related person information.

 This profile allows exchange of information about a person that is involved in the care for an individual, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: family
parameters.description:
The patient's family name (surname). [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the family name of the patient
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.name.family |

parameters.name: given
parameters.description:
A portion of the given name of the patient [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the given name of the patient
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.name.given |

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description:
Gender of the patient [Patient](patient.html): Gender of the patient
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)| Patient.gender |

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description:
The patient's date of birth [Patient](patient.html): The patient's date of birth
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)| Patient.birthDate |

parameters.name: death-date
parameters.description:
The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)|  (Patient.deceased as dateTime) |

parameters.name: address-postcode
parameters.description:
A postalCode specified in an address

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check HL7 FHIR conformance.**

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description:
Correction to actual PDS API. A postalCode specified in an address [Patient](patient.html): A postalCode specified in an address
| Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.address.postalCode |

parameters.name: general-practitioner:identifier
parameters.description:
Correction to PDS API. Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Patient.generalPractitioner.identifier | Patient.generalPractitioner.where(resolve() is Resource).identifier |

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description:
Correction to PDS API. Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  Patient.generalPractitioner |
